help_support.title: Help & Support
help_support.subtitle: We're here to assist you with any questions or concerns
help_support.how_can_we_help: How can we help you today?
help_support.message_placeholder: Describe your issue or question here...
help_support.message_validation_error: Please provide a detailed description (at least 10 characters).
help_support.message_sent_success: Your message has been sent! Our support team will respond within 24 hours.
help_support.emergency_support_note: 24/7 phone support available for emergencies and lost/stolen cards.

pin_change.question: How do I change my PIN?
pin_change.answer: Contact our customer support team and they will be able to generate a new pin for your account

transfer_limits.question: What are the daily transfer limits?
transfer_limits.answer: The standard daily transfer limit is Ksh 10,000. However, this may vary depending on your account type and standing. You can view your specific limit in your Account Information page under the Account Details tab. If you need a temporary increase, please contact customer support.

unauthorized_transactions.question: What should I do if I notice unauthorized transactions?
unauthorized_transactions.answer: If you notice any unauthorized transactions, you should immediately: 1) Lock your account through the Security menu; 2) Contact our 24/7 support line at +(254)-98-466-352; 3) Report the incident by filling out the form in the Security section of your dashboard. We'll investigate the issue and respond within 24 hours.

lost_card.question: How do I report a lost or stolen card?
lost_card.answer: To report a lost or stolen card, please call our emergency support line at +(254)-98-466-352 immediately. You can also lock your card temporarily through the Account Information page. After reporting, a new card will be issued and delivered to your registered address within 5-7 business days.

transfer_processing.question: How long does it take for transfers to process?
transfer_processing.answer: Internal transfers between accounts within our bank are processed immediately. Transfers to other banks typically process within 1-2 business days, depending on the receiving bank and the time of transaction.

banking_guide.title: Banking Guide
banking_guide.subtitle: Everything you need to know about your banking experience

navigating_dashboard.title: Navigating Your Dashboard
navigating_dashboard.intro: Your dashboard is the central hub for managing your finances. Here's what you'll find:

account_overview.label: Account Overview
account_overview.description: View balances and recent transactions for all your accounts.

quick_actions.label: Quick Actions
quick_actions.description: Easily access common tasks like deposits, transfers, and bill payments.

financial_summary.label: Financial Summary
financial_summary.description: Get a snapshot of your spending and savings trends.

notifications.label: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay updated with important alerts about your accounts.

navigating_dashboard.tip: Customize your dashboard by clicking the "Personalize" option in the top right corner to show the information most relevant to you.

savings.title: Savings Account
savings.description: Earn interest on your deposits while maintaining easy access to your funds.

checking.title: Checking Account
checking.description: Your everyday spending account for regular transactions and bill payments.

settings.title: Managing Account Settings
settings.intro: You can customize various settings for your accounts:

nicknames.label: Account Nicknames
nicknames.description: Rename your accounts for easier identification.

statements.label: Statement Preferences
statements.description: Choose between electronic or paper statements.

alerts.label: Transaction Alerts
alerts.description: Set up notifications for specific transaction types or amounts.

users.label: Authorized Users
users.description: Add or remove people who can access your account.

deposits.title: Making Deposits
deposits.intro: There are several ways to add funds to your account:

direct.label: Direct Deposit
direct.description: Set up automatic deposits from your employer or other income sources.

mobile.label: Mobile Deposit
mobile.description: Use the app to deposit checks by taking photos.

branch.label: Branch Deposit
branch.description: Visit any of our branches during operating hours.

atm.label: ATM Deposit
atm.description: Use our network of ATMs for cash or check deposits.

transfers.title: Transferring Funds
transfers.intro: Move money between your accounts or send to others:

internal.label: Internal Transfers
internal.description: Move money between your own accounts instantly.

external.label: External Transfers
external.description: Send money to accounts at other banks (1-2 business days).

recurring.label: Recurring Transfers
recurring.description: Schedule automatic transfers on a regular basis.

wire.label: Wire Transfers
wire.description: Send larger amounts domestically or internationally for a fee.

transfers.tip: Set up recurring transfers to your savings account to automate your saving habits.

history.title: Transaction History
history.intro: Keep track of your financial activity:
history.view_months: View up to 24 months of transaction history online.
history.filter: Filter transactions by date, amount, or type.
history.search: Search for specific transactions using keywords.
history.download: Download statements in PDF or CSV format.
history.categorize: Categorize transactions for better budget tracking.

mobile.title: Mobile Banking
mobile.intro: Our mobile app provides convenient access to your accounts:

online.title: Online Banking
online.intro: Our secure website offers comprehensive account management:

features.view_accounts: View all accounts and transactions in one place

security_tips.title: Security Tips
security_tips.description: Learn how to protect your accounts and personal information.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.description: Review the complete terms of service for your accounts.

support_footer.intro: Need further assistance? Contact our customer support team:

security_tips.title: Security Tips
security_tips.subtitle: Protecting your financial information and accounts
security_tips.overview: At Secure Bank, we take the security of your accounts and personal information very seriously. While we employ advanced security measures to protect your data, security is a shared responsibility. Follow these essential tips to help safeguard your banking information and identity.

strong.title: Create Strong Credentials
strong.description: Use unique PINs and passwords that combine letters, numbers, and special characters. Avoid easily guessable information like birthdays or sequential numbers.

updates.title: Regular Updates
updates.description: Change your PIN and online banking password every 3-6 months.

unique.title: Unique Passwords
unique.description: Use different passwords for your banking accounts than you use for other online services.

manager.title: Password Manager
manager.description: Consider using a reputable password manager to generate and store complex passwords securely.

warning.title: Never share your PIN or password
warning.description: Bank staff will never ask for your complete PIN or password. Be suspicious of any requests for these credentials.

2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
2fa.description: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security by requiring a second verification step when you log in or perform sensitive transactions.

sms.title: SMS Code
sms.description: A one-time code sent to your registered mobile number.

app.title: Authentication App
app.description: Generate time-based codes using an authentication app on your smartphone.

biometric.title: Biometric Verification
biometric.description: Use your fingerprint or face recognition for enhanced security.

info.title: Enable 2FA for all accounts
info.description: Go to Settings > Security in your online banking profile to enable and manage 2FA options.

device.title: Secure Device Practices
device.os_updates: Keep your computer, smartphone, and tablet operating systems up to date
device.antivirus: Install and maintain reputable antivirus and anti-malware software
device.secure_connection: Use a secure, private internet connection for banking activities
device.screen_lock: Enable automatic screen lock on all your devices
device.clear_cache: Regularly clear your browser cache and cookies

alert.title: Avoid public Wi-Fi for banking
alert.description: Never conduct banking activities on public or unsecured Wi-Fi networks. Use your mobile data connection instead, or wait until you have access to a secure network.

dos.direct_url: Type the bank's URL directly in your browser or use bookmarks
dos.https: Look for "https://" and the padlock icon in the address bar
dos.logout: Log out completely when you finish your banking session
dos.monitor: Monitor your accounts regularly for unauthorized activity
dos.app: Use the official mobile banking app instead of the browser when on mobile devices

donts.links: Click on links in emails or messages claiming to be from your bank
donts.unattended: Leave your device unattended while logged into online banking
donts.save_password: Save your banking password in your browser
donts.remember_me: Use the "Remember Me" option on shared or public computers
donts.downloads: Download files or click on pop-ups while banking online

scams.title: Common Scams to Watch For

phishing.title: Phishing
phishing.description: Fraudulent emails, text messages, or calls that appear to be from your bank requesting personal information or login credentials.
phishing.red_flag: Red Flag: Urgent requests for personal information or threatening language

smishing.title: Smishing
smishing.description: Text messages claiming to be from your bank, often containing suspicious links or requesting sensitive information.
smishing.red_flag: Red Flag: Messages about "suspicious activity" that ask you to click links

vishing.title: Vishing
vishing.description: Voice calls where scammers pose as bank representatives to extract personal or account information.
vishing.red_flag: Red Flag: Callers who pressure you to act immediately or provide credentials

fake_apps.title: Fake Banking Apps
fake_apps.description: Counterfeit mobile applications designed to steal your login information and banking details.
fake_apps.red_flag: Red Flag: Apps not downloaded from official app stores or with poor reviews

scams.remember_description: Secure Bank will never request your PIN, full password, or security codes via email, phone, or text message. We will never ask you to transfer money to a "safe account."

act.title: Act Immediately
act.description: Contact our security hotline at +(254)-98-466-352 as soon as you suspect fraudulent activity.

secure.title: Secure Your Account
secure.description: Lock your card and accounts through the mobile app or online banking.

change.title: Change Credentials
change.description: Update your PIN and passwords from a secure device.

document.title: Document Everything
document.description: Keep records of suspicious messages, calls, or transactions to share with our fraud team.

monitor.title: Monitor Your Accounts
monitor.description: Check your accounts regularly for any unauthorized transactions.

guard.title: Guard Your Card
guard.description: Keep your card in a secure location and never leave it unattended.

shield.title: Shield Your PIN
shield.description: Cover the keypad when entering your PIN at ATMs or payment terminals.

inspect.title: Inspect ATMs
inspect.description: Check for unusual devices or attachments on ATMs that could be skimming devices.

report.title: Report Lost Cards
report.description: Contact our 24/7 emergency line immediately if your card is lost or stolen.

monitor.title: Monitor Statements
monitor.description: Review your card statements regularly and report any unauthorized transactions.

controls.title: Use Card Controls in Our App

online_shopping.title: Safe Online Shopping
online_shopping.secure_websites: Only shop on secure websites (look for https:// and the padlock icon)
online_shopping.credit_card: Use a credit card or virtual card number for online purchases when possible
online_shopping.records: Keep records of your online purchases and confirmations
online_shopping.authentication: Opt for additional authentication steps for online payments
online_shopping.suspicious: Be suspicious of deals that seem too good to be true

virtual_card.title: Virtual Card Feature
virtual_card.description: Use our Virtual Card feature in the mobile app for online shopping. These temporary card numbers provide an extra layer of security for your actual account.

footer.title: Stay Informed About Security
footer.description: We continuously update our security measures to protect your accounts. Visit this page regularly for the latest security tips and updates.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Agreement governing your use of Secure Bank services

intro.paragraph1: This Terms & Conditions Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into between you ("Customer") and Secure Bank ("Bank", "we", "us", "our"). By using any of our services, including our website, mobile applications, account services, or other banking products, you agree to be bound by these terms.
intro.paragraph2: Please read this Agreement carefully before accessing or using our services. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.

definitions.title: 1. Definitions
definitions.intro: In this Agreement, unless the context requires otherwise:

terms.account: "Account" means any account held with Secure Bank, including savings accounts, checking accounts, and any other account types offered by the Bank.
terms.customer_id: "Customer ID" means the unique identification number assigned to you upon registration.
terms.pin: "PIN" means Personal Identification Number used for authentication.
terms.online_banking: "Online Banking" means the Bank's internet banking service accessed via our website.
terms.mobile_banking: "Mobile Banking" means the Bank's banking service accessed via our mobile application.
terms.transaction: "Transaction" means any activity that affects your account balance, including deposits, withdrawals, and transfers.
terms.business_day: "Business Day" means Monday to Friday, excluding public holidays.

opening.title: 2.1 Account Opening
opening.intro: To open an account with Secure Bank, you must:
requirements: Provide accurate and complete personal information
Meet the minimum age requirement of 18 years
Agree to our account terms and conditions
opening.note: The Bank reserves the right to refuse to open an account at its discretion.

maintenance.title: 2.2 Account Maintenance
maintenance.intro: As an account holder, you are responsible for:
responsibilities: Maintaining the minimum balance requirement for your account type
Updating your personal information promptly when changes occur
Reviewing account statements regularly for accuracy
Notifying the Bank of any discrepancies within 30 days of statement issuance

closure.title: 2.3 Account Closure
closure.intro: Either party may close your account by providing written notice. The Bank may close your account:
reasons: If you breach any terms of this Agreement
If your account remains at zero balance for 90 consecutive days
For any other reason as permitted by applicable law
closure.note: Upon account closure, any remaining balance will be paid to you after deducting any outstanding fees or charges.

registration.title: 3.1 Registration
registration.description: To access our online and mobile banking services, you must register using your Customer ID and set up security credentials. By registering, you agree to the additional terms specific to digital banking services.

security_credentials.title: 3.2 Security Credentials
responsibilities: Keeping your Customer ID, PIN, and passwords confidential
Not sharing your security credentials with any third party
Using secure devices and connections for banking activities
Changing your credentials regularly and if you suspect a security breach

access.title: 3.3 Access and Availability
access.description: While we strive to ensure continuous availability of our online and mobile banking services, we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. Services may be unavailable due to:
access.note: The Bank will not be liable for any losses or inconvenience caused by service unavailability.

device_compatibility.title: 3.4 Device Compatibility
device_compatibility.description: You are responsible for ensuring that your devices meet the minimum technical requirements for our services. The Bank is not responsible for any issues arising from device incompatibility.

authorization.title: 4.1 Transaction Authorization
authorization.description: By initiating a transaction, you authorize the Bank to execute it on your behalf. All transactions are subject to verification and the Bank's approval.

limits.title: 4.2 Transaction Limits
limits.intro: The following default limits apply to transactions:
default_limits: Daily mobile banking transaction limit: Ksh 10,000
limits.note: These limits may vary based on your account type and standing. The Bank reserves the right to modify these limits at any time.

processing_times.title: 4.3 Transaction Processing Times
times: Internal transfers between Secure Bank accounts: Immediate
External transfers to other banks: 1-2 business days
processing_times.note: Transaction times are estimates and may vary based on various factors. The Bank is not responsible for delays caused by intermediary banks or other external factors.

disputes.title: 4.4 Transaction Disputes
disputes.intro: If you believe an unauthorized transaction has occurred or if there is an error in your account:
steps: Provide details of the disputed transaction
Submit any supporting documentation requested by the Bank
disputes.resolution: The Bank will investigate all disputes and provide a resolution within 30 days. If you do not report an unauthorized transaction within 60 days of it appearing on your statement, you may not be eligible for reimbursement.

schedule.title: 5.1 Schedule of Fees
schedule.intro: The Bank charges fees for certain services according to our current fee schedule, which may include:
schedule.note: The complete fee schedule is available at our branches and on our website.

changes.title: 5.2 Fee Changes
changes.description: The Bank reserves the right to modify fees at any time. We will provide at least 30 days' notice before implementing any fee changes.

payment.title: 5.3 Payment of Fees
payment.description: You authorize the Bank to deduct any applicable fees directly from your account. If your account has insufficient funds to cover the fees, you agree to pay the outstanding amount upon demand.

data_collection.title: 6.1 Data Collection
data_collection.intro: The Bank collects personal information from you for the purpose of providing banking services. This information may include:
types: Device and usage information when using digital services

data_usage.title: 6.2 Data Usage
data_usage.intro: The Bank uses your personal data to:
purposes: Process transactions and provide banking services
Verify your identity and prevent fraud
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
Communicate with you about your accounts and our services

data_sharing.title: 6.3 Data Sharing
data_sharing.intro: The Bank may share your information with:
recipients: Third-party service providers who assist in providing banking services
Regulatory authorities and law enforcement agencies as required by law
Other financial institutions for transaction processing
data_sharing.note: We will not sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

data_security.title: 6.4 Data Security
data_security.description: The Bank implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or damage. However, no data transmission over the internet or storage system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

data_retention.title: 6.5 Data Retention
data_retention.description: The Bank will retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by applicable laws and regulations.

bank_responsibilities.title: 7.1 Bank Responsibilities
bank_responsibilities.intro: The Bank is committed to maintaining the security of your accounts and information by:
measures: Providing secure channels for banking transactions

customer_responsibilities.title: 7.2 Customer Responsibilities
responsibilities: Using secure devices and connections for banking activities
Regularly checking your accounts for unauthorized transactions
Notifying the Bank immediately of any security concerns
Following the security guidelines provided in our Security Tips

reporting_incidents.title: 7.3 Reporting Security Incidents
reporting_incidents.intro: If you suspect unauthorized access to your account or any other security breach, you must immediately:
steps: Follow any additional security instructions provided by the Bank

bank_liability.title: 8.1 Bank Liability
bank_liability.intro: The Bank will be liable for:
liabilities: Direct losses resulting from unauthorized transactions, provided you have complied with your security responsibilities and reported the unauthorized activity within the specified timeframe
Losses caused by the Bank's negligence or willful misconduct

limitation.title: 8.2 Limitation of Liability
limitation.intro: The Bank will not be liable for:
limitations: Losses arising from circumstances beyond our reasonable control
Losses resulting from your failure to comply with security requirements
Delays or failures in executing transactions due to technical issues, third-party service providers, or other factors beyond our control
Issues arising from device incompatibility or internet connectivity problems
Any amount greater than the transaction amount in dispute

disclaimers.title: 8.3 Disclaimers
disclaimers.intro: The Bank's services are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties or representations, express or implied, regarding:
items: The continuous availability of our services
The error-free operation of our systems
The accuracy or completeness of information provided through our services
The suitability of our services for your specific needs

by_customer.title: 9.1 Termination by Customer
by_customer.intro: You may terminate your use of our services at any time by:
steps: Submitting a written request to close your account(s)
Returning any Bank-issued cards or other access devices
Settling any outstanding obligations to the Bank

by_bank.title: 9.2 Termination by Bank
by_bank.intro: The Bank may terminate your access to our services, with or without notice, if:
reasons: You breach any terms of this Agreement
We suspect fraudulent activity or misuse of our services
You provide false or misleading information
Required by law or regulatory authority
For other valid reasons as determined by the Bank

effect.title: 9.3 Effect of Termination
effects: Your access to the terminated services will cease immediately
Any outstanding transactions may be completed or canceled at the Bank's discretion
You remain liable for any obligations incurred prior to termination
Applicable fees may be charged for account closure

changes.title: 10.1 Changes to Agreement
changes.intro: The Bank reserves the right to modify this Agreement at any time. Changes may include:
types: Updates to reflect changes in laws or regulations
Changes to service features or functionality

notice.title: 10.2 Notice of Changes
notice.intro: The Bank will notify you of material changes to this Agreement through:
methods: Other communication methods as determined by the Bank
notice.note: Material changes will be communicated at least 30 days before they take effect, unless otherwise required by law.

acceptance.title: 10.3 Acceptance of Changes
acceptance.description: Your continued use of our services after the effective date of any changes constitutes your acceptance of the modified Agreement. If you do not agree with the changes, you must terminate your use of our services before the effective date.

applicable_law.title: 11.1 Applicable Law
applicable_law.description: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Kenya, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

dispute_resolution.title: 11.2 Dispute Resolution
dispute_resolution.intro: Any disputes arising from or relating to this Agreement shall be resolved as follows:

steps.customer_service: First, contact our customer service to resolve the issue
steps.formal_complaint: If not resolved, submit a formal written complaint to the Bank
steps.mediation: If still unresolved, the dispute may be referred to a mutually agreed mediator
steps.legal: As a last resort, either party may pursue legal remedies in the courts of Kenya

severability.title: 11.3 Severability
severability.description: If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable, such provision shall be struck and the remaining provisions shall be enforced to the fullest extent under law.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.intro: For questions or concerns regarding this Agreement or our services, please contact us:

customer_service.title: Customer Service
customer_service.hours: Available Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM

footer.acceptance: By using any of Secure Bank's services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Agreement.

full_name_min_length: Full name must be at least 2 characters
email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
phone_number_invalid: Please enter a valid Kenyan phone number
address_min_length: Address must be at least 5 characters
phone_number_format_error: Phone number must start with 7 or 1 followed by 8 digits (e.g. 712345678)
profile_update_error: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
profile_load_error: Failed to load profile information. Please try again later.
